title: Employees with zero hours contracts in the UK 2000 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Employees in thousands. In total the number of data points it has is 20.
Overall Employees in thousands has increased over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Employees in thousands, about 903.0 was reported at Year 2016
The lowest Employees in thousands, of value 108.0 was reported at Year 2004
